message.content:
cs.IT, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.NA, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with phase recovery, which is a common problem in signal processing and image analysis. The use of a multivariate Von Mises distribution as a prior is a technique commonly used in statistical modeling and inference. The Bayesian formulation and the optimization procedure used in the paper are also common techniques in machine learning and optimization. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.IT (Information Theory), cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition), and cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also involves numerical optimization, which is a common topic in cs.NA (Numerical Analysis) and cs.SI (Systems and Control).
